programme.title: Cloud Cities of Venus

programme.title: Local Knowledge S6:E5 "The Slow Pitch"
programme.desc: With slow pitch jigging being the newest craze, Rush and buddy Dane head out to test some new tackle and go for “mutton or nothing.” Meanwhile in California, Ali gets his hand on the new gear and prepares to hop a flight and join in on the “slow pitch” party with the guys in Key West.

programme.title: Local Knowledge S6:E6 "Tails and Teeth"
programme.desc: When the weather in San Diego throws the crew a curveball, Ali, Rush and friend Brandon Nelson put together plan B. Targeting Yellowtail and Mako sharks, the guys search for kelp paddies on the horizon and look to friend at the fish house for some “shark attractant” to make it all come together.

programme.title: Uncharted Waters with Peter Miller S4:E5
programme.desc: Peter continues his Bahamian adventure, walking the flats in search of bonefish. Then he runs out to the reef in search of more mutton snapper and takes a trip to Pig Island to feed and swim with the pigs. To complete the journey, Peter and his girlfriend go horseback riding along the surf on the pink sand beach. PART 2

programme.title: Uncharted Waters with Peter Miller S4:E6 "Peter and his girlfriend Alessia, travel to Pacific Fins, Guatemala targeting Big Mahi Mahi, Cubera Snapper and of course, sailfish."
programme.desc: Peter travels to Pacific Fins, Guatemala targeting Big Mahi Mahi, Cubera Snapper and of course, sailfish. Peter's girlfriend Alessia joins him on this adventure and is treated to her first ever, Giant Pacific Sailfish and massive Mahi Mahi. They cook the Mahi on the boat right after catching it and feast on it while sailfish keep interrupting them. They visit an avocado plantation and make some delicious guacamole, and then head into town and donate Salt Life clothing to the local kids and make new friends along the way.

programme.title: Uncharted Waters With Peter Miller S4:E1 "Peter travels to Grande Isle, Louisiana in search of Red Fish and Yellowfin Tuna."
programme.desc: Peter travels to Grande Isle, Louisiana in search of redfish and yellowfin tuna. Fishing the bays and behind shrimp boats. They are treated with a shark frenzy of epic proportions and enough drag pulling action to put the average person in traction…PART 1

programme.title: Two Conchs Sportfishing TV S2:E5 "Ladies, Ladies, Ladies"
programme.desc: Who says fishing is for the boys? This group of ladies is going out with Two Conchs for a few days and showing everyone that fishing isn't just for the men.

programme.title: Two Conchs Sportfishing TV S2:E6 "Yellowfins as Far as You Can See"
programme.desc: When you own a Yellowfin boat, you are part of an elite club. And what better way to spend time with this group of people than the Yellowfin.

programme.title: Two Conchs Sportfishing TV S2:E8 "Two Conchs Fish Camp"
programme.desc: Each year Jack and the Two Conchs crew like to put on a fishing camp. This is an educational few days of fishing that is both good for clients and the crew.

programme.title: Kingfish Mayhem TV S1:E3 "Land of the Giants"
programme.desc: Key West is known as the "land of the giants," but will Four Reel Fishing Team and Sweet Caroline Fishing Team be able to find them? Jump aboard the pro series teams jockey for position at the Key West Kingfish Mayhem.

programme.title: Kingfish Mayhem TV S1:E4 "Key West Wrap Up"
programme.desc: Time is running out for the teams fishing the Key West Kingfish Mayhem. You won't believe the size of the fish hitting the scales, and the payouts won by the top competitors.

programme.title: Gale Force Twins S1:E5 "The Most Magical Bass Fishing Trip - Disney World"
programme.desc: After a very successful ICAST week we decided to spend a fun day fishing on the Magic Kingdom Lake with our Team Rainshadow family! We were very excited to teach our friend Eden how to bass fish and hopefully catch her first ever largemouth bass. Of course we had to spend some time fishing in front of the very famous shoe tree and then release our catches in front of Cinderella's castle for a happily ever after! https://www.galeforcefishing.com

programme.title: Gale Force Twins S1:E6 "How To Target Yellowtail Snapper With Oatmeal"
programme.desc: Learning to catch delicious yellowtail snapper doesn't have to be difficult. One of our favorite techniques to landing these fish, which have excellent eyesight, is using oat balls or oatmeal to cloud the water, get your bait past the blue runners and bait fish and hopefully start a feeding frenzy! In this video we go over targeting yellowtail snappers at the deep reef and also the shallow patch reefs. Just remember to always experiment with your jig sizes based on current! https://www.galeforcefishing.com

programme.title: Gale Force Twins S1:E12 "How To Catch Permit – Fishing The Yearly Spawn"
programme.desc: Every spring in the Florida Keys the tarpon begin to migrate, the sailfish can be found tailing and the permit are spawning. It’s one of our favorite fishing seasons for obvious reasons. Our long time viewers will probably remember Emily’s favorite fish to catch is permit! In this video we teach you how to catch permit on the wrecks in 100ft of water. What bait, hook, line and even rod and reel to use can be a vital difference to a day skunked or a day landing these yellow bellied fish! https://www.galeforcefishing.com

programme.title: WPT Greatest Season 2 Episode 3
programme.desc: WPT Greatest Tales from the Felt takes a look back at the most legendary final tables in WPT history. On this episode, we revisit the final table at season four’s, Five Diamond World Poker Classic from Bellagio in Las Vegas. This final table was tough and featured Doyle Brunson, JJ Liu, Patrik Antonious, the “Unabomber” Phil Laak, and “Gigabet” Darrel Dickens. The amateur at the table was Rehne Pederson who got in off of $100 online tournament. They are all competing for a chance to win over 2 million dollars. With a star studded final table the competition is tough and the poker player is some of the best ever at a WPT final table.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Jordan Makin - The BFFG
programme.desc: Born and raised in the heart of Utah County, Jordan Makin had to compensate for his red hair and uneventful childhood by learning to be funny. His unique observations will make you laugh and his stories about feeling awkward will help you appreciate your life more. He has worked with many comedy greats, such as Marc Maron, Ryan Hamilton, and Drew Lynch. His comedy has been featured at the Finger Lakes Comedy Festival and the Idaho Laugh Fest. Jordan is the co-creator and co-host of The Happy Valley Podcast.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Michael Palascak - 1984
programme.desc: Michael Palascak's dry humor shines with riffs on interviewing for a pyramid scheme, living with his parents after college, and how life is way better now than in 1984.

programme.title: Dave Burleigh - Nobody's Keeping You Here
programme.desc: Comedian and Impressionist Dave Burleigh's star is on the rise. His uncanny ability to impersonate just about anyone landed him the starring role as Charlie Sheen in "Not Another Celebrity Movie." Burleigh's multiple characters, voices, and impressions were showcased on Season 7 of America's Got Talent, where he became a fast favorite of both judges and fans alike. Judge Howard Stern said, "You have an excellent command of the stage." Fellow comedian and judge Howie Mandel added, "Your impressions were spot on." Burleigh's laid back and easy going style and persona on stage contrasted with his unique facial and body expressions are guaranteed to leave audiences amazed and impressed. As a two-time finalist in the San Francisco Comedy Competition, Burleigh now shares the first runner-up spot with past participant comedy legends like Robin Williams, Ellen DeGeneres, Marc Maron, Dane Cook and Kevin Pollak. With numerous television, podcast and radio appearances, prestigious publications like Rolling Stone are talking, "Burleigh has the trappings of a soon to be comedy star!" This talented, singer, musician, actor, comedian and host tours the world over 36 weeks a year and headlines all the major casinos in Las Vegas. Make sure to catch Dave's show at a theater or comedy club near you, as he will no doubt, leave you with a lasting impression.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Josh Blue - The Disabled List
programme.desc: Following his groundbreaking win on NBC’s Last Comic Standing in 2006, Josh Blue has risen through the ranks to become a well-established headliner at venues throughout the world.

programme.title: Andy Beningo - Adorable Tough Guy
programme.desc: Over the past decade, Andy Beningo has established himself as one of the hardest working comedians in the business. Performing his clever, "every man" material has led to some 2,700 career performances. Along the way, he has appeared on AXS Gotham Comedy Live, as a final four finalist on CMT's Next Big Comic, and on the Bob and Tom radio show. Beningo's new CD regularly plays on Laugh USA on XM Sirius Radio. He's been hailed for his clean comedy, and was named one of the 40 Best Up and Coming Comedians in the country. He was also named "Best Comedian" by both the Detroit Metro Times and Detroit Hour magazine.

programme.title: Erica Rhodes - I Love You More
programme.desc: Erica Rhodes is a regular panelist on Comedy Central’s @midnight and Fox’s Punchline. She has made appearances on SeeSo’s The Guest List, Hulu’s Coming to the Stage, AXS’ Live at Gotham and the syndicated Comics Unleashed. Erica has performed at San Francisco Sketchfest, the Moontower Comedy Festival (Austin, TX), the Blue Whale Comedy Festival (Tulsa, OK), the Boston Comedy Festival and RIOT LA Fest. Recent TV credits include ABC’s Modern Family, HBO’s Veep, Fox’s New Girl, and IFC’s Comedy Bang Bang. Erica stars in Audible’s Dr. Katz: The Audio Files and ABC Digital’s The Off Season. She recurs on TruTV’s Fameless and has been a semi-regular performer/writer on NPR’s A Prairie Home Companion.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Drew Barth - Shoulda Tried Harder
programme.desc: Drew Barth is one of the fastest rising comedy stars in the Northwest. Born just outside the city of Seattle, what started as a dare in high school has become a full-time career. Drew Barth has risen through the ranks of local open mics to become a regular performer at comedy clubs, colleges, casinos and private events up and down the West Coast. After making the finals of the Seattle International Comedy Competition, Drew Barth spent a great deal of time in Los Angeles performing at clubs such as The Comedy Store, Laugh Factory, and The Improv, honing his craft.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Chelle T - It Just Got Real
programme.desc: As a mother of seven, Chelle T has seen it all, and shes not afraid to joke about it. Quippy and honest, Chelle T talks about how children are raised differently these days, menopause, being married for twenty-three years, and how desperate you sometimes become when youre a mom in this special.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Tim Wilkins - Password Protected
programme.desc: Today that dream is more alive than ever as he is a 20-year veteran stand-up comedian, TV and radio personality, speaker and writer, who has performed on stages around the world. He has entertained millions in legendary venues ranging from Radio City Music Hall to chow halls in Afghanistan, to colleges, casinos and cruise ships.

programme.title: David Crowe - White Bread
programme.desc: David Crowe is a 20 year veteran of the comedy stage. After winning both the Seattle and San Francisco Comedy Competitions, then performing for a US President the same year, his career took off and has never stopped. On stage Crowe is armed with a "gallery of facial expressions", a host of accents and a "nerdy charisma that is utterly captivating." He has been featured on Showtime with his own One Hour Comedy Special "Crooked Finger," along with numerous appearances on Comedy Central, Bob&Tom Radio, SiriusXM and Pandora. Overseas, he crushed the competition at the Edinburgh International Fringe Festival garnering three perfect 5-Star reviews from their rather sticky and jaded press (you can read them here in the Testimonials section). David is a guaranteed hit on the corporate entertainment circuit. He has performed at literally hundreds of corporate and private events across the United States and Canada. (See "Past Client" list under Testimonials). He recently concluded a nationwide comedy tour for Investors Group, a financial services company, where he performed for over 60,000 of their most valued clients in 60 different cities. To date, David has released five comedy albums. He believes the best way to stay sharp and relevant is to continue to hone and perfect new material at comedy clubs across the country with the goal of releasing an new comedy special every few years.

programme.title: Keith Stubbs - Pound Cake
programme.desc: Keith Stubbs is a 'triple threat' in showbiz and entertainment. He's a hilarious stand-up comedian, talented actor, and award-winning radio personality.Keith was twice voted 'Best Comedian' by City Weekly, the Standard-Examiner named him 'Funniest Comic' and he was a semi-finalist in Comedy Central's Laugh Riots comedy competition. The Utah-based comic has made television appearances on A&E's An Evening at the Improv, nationally syndicated Comedy.TV, ABC's America's Funniest People and has established himself as a funny, improvisational comic, host, roastmaster and emcee.Keith tours nationally and has shared the stage with showbiz legends Joan Rivers, Jeff Foxworthy, Bill Cosby, Jim Gaffigan, Sinbad, Gladys Knight, and Frank Caliendo. Keith was one of five comedians who performed for the athletes in the Olympic Village at the 2002 Winter Games.Keith was named Best Actor by City Weekly for his show-stopping, comedic performance as 'Vinnie Black' in the stage production of Tony 'n Tina's Wedding. Stubbs currently plays Rob Schneider's accountant in the TV series "Real Rob" on Netflix.For eight consecutive years, Keith was awarded "Best Radio Personality" by the Utah Broadcasters' Association for his time spent as host of "The Stubbs Show" on 101.5 The Eagle. He also hosted KEITH STUBBS SPORTS on ESPN700 in Salt Lake City and appeared nationally on CMT radio and the Blue Collar Comedy channel on SiriusXM.Keith is often recognized for being a clean comedian, although his audiences span a broad spectrum. One review said, "Keith was funny, period! He was clean but we hardly noticed because his comedy and style are so unique and spot on."

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Mike Burton - I Can Get Whiter
programme.desc: Mike Burton delivers his comedy with high energy, great storytelling, and hilarious facial expressions. Mike started his stand-up comedy career in 1996 first performing in the local clubs in NYC, then gaining nationwide popularity. He has been on TV shows, independent feature films, and commercials for HP and Modells. Mike has also performed in daytime shows: Rachel Ray, The Chew, and ABC's The Revolution.
